articles.author: SAM MEDNICK and JACK JEFFERY
articles.description: TEL AVIV, Israel (AP) — A Hamas delegation was in Cairo on Saturday as Egyptian state media reported “noticeable progress” in cease-fire talks for Gaza.
articles.title: There's progress reported in Gaza truce talks, but Israel downplays chances of ending war with Hamas

articles.author: JOSH FUNK
articles.description: OMAHA, Neb. (AP) — Warren Buffett cautioned the tens of thousands of shareholders who packed an arena for his annual meeting that artificial intelligence scams could become "the growth industry of all time."
articles.title: Warren Buffett says AI may be better for scammers than society. And he's seen how

articles.author: BETH HARRIS
articles.description: LOUISVILLE, Ky. (AP) — Mystik Dan won the 150th Kentucky Derby in a three-horse photo finish, edging out Sierra Leone by a nose with Forever Young third in the tightest finish since 1996 on Saturday.
articles.title: Mystik Dan wins 150th Kentucky Derby by a nose in a 3-horse photo finish at Churchill Downs

articles.author: ERIC TUCKER
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Crucial witnesses took the stand in the second week of testimony in Donald Trump's hush money trial, including a California lawyer who negotiated deals at the center of the case and a longtime adviser to the former president.
articles.title: Hulk Hogan, hurricanes and a blockbuster recording: A week in review of the Trump hush money trial

articles.author: MARK STEVENSON
articles.description: MEXICO CITY (AP) — Three bodies recovered in an area of Mexico's Baja California state are likely to be those of the two Australians and an American who went missing last weekend during a camping and surfing trip, the state prosecutor’s office said Saturday.
articles.title: Bodies recovered likely those of 2 Australians, 1 American who went missing, Mexican prosecutors say

articles.author: SEUNG MIN KIM, JILL COLVIN and CALVIN WOODWARD
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Joe Biden and Donald Trump are two presidents with unfinished business and an itch to get it done.
articles.title: Biden and Trump offer worlds-apart contrasts on issues in 2024's rare contest between two presidents

articles.author: LAURA UNGAR
articles.description: NAMPA, Idaho (AP) — Waiting in a long post office line with the latest shipment of “abortion aftercare kits,” Kimra Luna got a text. A woman who’d taken abortion pills three weeks earlier was worried about bleeding — and disclosing the cause to a doctor.
articles.title: After Roe, the network of people who help others get abortions see themselves as 'the underground'

articles.author: JUAN A. LOZANO and LEKAN OYEKANMI
articles.description: HOUSTON (AP) — High waters flooded neighborhoods around Houston on Saturday following heavy rains that have already resulted in crews rescuing more than 400 people from homes, rooftops and roads engulfed in murky water.
articles.title: Hundreds rescued from flooding in Texas as waters continue rising in Houston

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.description: Russia has put Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy on its wanted list, Russian state media reported Saturday, citing the interior ministry’s database.
articles.title: Russia puts Ukrainian President Zelenskyy on its wanted list

articles.author: MARC LEVY
articles.description: HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) — The student protest movement disrupting university campuses, classes and graduation ceremonies over the war in Gaza is also roiling Senate contests across the nation as Democrats tread cautiously over an internal divide and Republicans play up their rivals' disagreements.
articles.title: Senate races are roiled by campus protests over the war in Gaza as campaign rhetoric sharpens
